description:
Haruaki is invited to observe Miki`s youkai studies class but things immediately get hectic when Miki decides to demonstrate his powers by having a little bit of sake...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Chaos ! L`étude des yôkai de M. Miki !
Panic! In Miki-sensei`s Youkai Studies Class!!
大混乱! 神酒先生の妖怪学!!
